s: Vinyl LP pressing. 1990 album from the Death Metal band. This debut full length platter was recorded and mixed at Morrisound Studios, Tampa, Florida. While containing mostly Satanic or blasphemous lyrical themes, "Lunatic of God's Creation" and "Carnage in the Temple of the Damned" concern Charles Manson and Jim Jones respectively, and "Dead by Dawn" deals with the plot of the 1981 horror film, The Evil Dead. t: Amazon.com: Deicide: The Roadrunner Years 1990-2001: CDs & Vinyl
